sentence: GOP Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona attended the third-annual America First Political Action Conference in Orlando, which was held Friday and organized by the far-right figure Nick Fuentes.
author: Connor Perrett
title: 'Morons': Mitt Romney goes after Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar for attending conference with white nationalist ties

sentence: CNN host Dana Bash asked Romney about a tweet by Liz Cheney, where she slammed Republican leadership for their silence on the matter: As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.
author: Heather
title: Mitt Romney: 'I Have Morons On My Team!'

sentence: In a similar abdication, few GOP leaders have been as outspoken and categorical as Romney in castigating Republican Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona, who recently shared their madcap musings with an audience of white supremacists in Florida.
author: Mark Barabak
title: Romney speaks harshly but honestly about Putin and GOP’s crackpots

sentence: An image shared on Instagram purportedly shows a tweet from Republican Arizona Rep. Paul Gosar about being called a “moron.” Verdict: False The tweet has been digitally fabricated.
author: Hannah Hudnall
title: FACT CHECK: Did Paul Gosar Send This Tweet About Being Called A ‘Moron’?

sentence: An image shared on Instagram purportedly shows a tweet from Republican Arizona Rep. Paul Gosar about being called a “moron.” Verdict: False The tweet has been digitally fabricated.
title: FACT CHECK: Did Paul Gosar Send This Tweet About Being Called A ‘Moron’?

sentence: Also, Romney referred to Greene and Rep. Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., as “morons” for attending a conference put on by a white supremacist where people cheered for Russian President Vladimir Putin after the invasion of Ukraine.
author: Dennis Romboy
title: Mitt Romney’s support of Ketanji Brown Jackson unleashes conservative vitriol
